name: Forevermore (Ein, JamesVagabond, Dmitry Manannikov)
description:
A 20-minute story about time, deduction, and a meddlesome bird.

The present is just a tiny slice of reality. Much is lost and hidden in the past, while many future events are lying in ambush, waiting for the right moment to happen. Piece everything together, and you just might find the truth.

  • Move - WASD / arrows
  • Interact - E / space
  • Run - Shift
  • Gamepad support is available
  • Fullscreen - button on the right

Made for Adventure Jam 2022 in 14 days.

If the game is lagging, make sure that hardware acceleration is enabled in your browser's settings. Safari is not supported, try Chrome.
